name: Lamina1 Identity
description: Lamina1 is a platform designed for the metaverse, providing scalable solutions for creators and developers. It focuses on building decentralized, open-source virtual worlds with a focus on seamless integration and interoperability.

chains.name: Lamina1Identity
chains.description: The Lamina1 Identity subnet provides decentralized identity services to the Lamina1 platform and wider Avalanche ecosystem.
